chapters.title: SPECIAL RIGHTS AND PRIVILEGES OF TENANTS AND PROVISIONS FOR DISTRIBUTION OF LAND FOR PERSONAL CULTIVATION
sub_chapters: (I) Termination of tenancy for personal cultivation and non-agricultural use.
(IIA) Termination of tenancy by Landlords, and purchase by tenants, of lands to which section 88C applies.
(III) Restriction upon holding Land in exess of ceiling area.

chapters.title: SPECIAL PROVISION FOR TERMINATION OF TENANCY BY LANDLORDS WHO ARE OR HAVE BEEN SERVING MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES; AND FOR PURCHASE OF THEIR LANDS BY TENANTS.
SPECIAL PROVISIONS IN RESPECT OF THE AREAS WITHIN THE LIMITS OF A MUNICIPALITY OR A CANTONMENT.
MANAGEMENT OF ESTATES HELD BY LAND HOLDERS.
RESTRICTIONS ON TRANSFERS OF AGRICULTURAL LANDS, MANAGEMENT OF UNCULTIVATED LANDS AND ACQUISITION OF ESTATES AND LANDS.
CONSTRUCTION OF WATER-COURSE THROUGH LAND OF ANOTHER
PROCEDURE AND JURISDICTION OF TRIBUNAL, MAMLATDAR AND COLLECTOR, APPEALS AND REVISION.
